title: Love Where You Live at Bella Vista Apartments!
posting_body: ['Welcome To The Best of TacomaBella Vista is\xa0a distinctive, hillside community in\xa0Tacoma.', 'Enjoy the privacy of our retreat-like property as well as the convenience of easy access to the freeway and major shopping areas.', 'Our one- and two-bedroom floor plans have all the amenities you deserve, including full-size washers and dryers and private patios or decks, many with incredible mountain and city views.', "As a resident you can relax on the sun deck with views of Mt. Rainier, work out in the fitness center and spend time with friends\xa0in the\xa0residents' lounge with free WiFi.", '\xa0A great location and\xa0beautiful mountain views make Bella Vista a perfect place to live.', '-Fitness Center', '-Carport', '-Mountain & City Views', '-24-Hour Service Line', '-Breakfast Bar', '-Dedicated Dining Room', '-Pet Friendly', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Playground', '-Patio/Balcony With Storage', '-Wood-burning Fireplaces', '-Sun Deck w/BBQ & Mt. Rainier Views', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'For more information please visit', '<URL>']
